TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content: Waiter! There's a guy who complaining about a guy who in someones soup who in his soup in my soup! Also, why am I in a soup bowl?

Sorry, sir, I'll go get the mini-waiter to attend to the man in your soup.

Waiter! There's a chunk of uranium in my soup!

cool your an us ^^

waiter there is a weird us oops in my soup ^^

You are beyond help, my good sir.

 

Waiter! There is nothing wrong with my soup. Give my compliments to the chef!

Don't you remember? You ARE the chef! *the Twilight Zone theme plays*

Waiter! There's a typewriter in my soup!

Well, just don't forget to hit the return!

Waiter! There's a passport in my soup!

To which country? If its in the EU, I'm outta here!

Waiter! I have a small child in my soup. It wasn't mine...

Ah, my apologies monseiur, wrong table.

Waiter, there's a war between the artichokes and the slow-cooked Lebanese chicken thigh in my soup!

Just wait a little, their final battle will be inside your stomach.

Mr.Bounser, how has this man brought his dog into our diner?

The dog is the manager

Waiter, there's no soup.
So, Neo, you need no spoon.

Qaiter is now not doing anything.

Waiter, why are you in my soup?
Waiter why is my soup hot when i look at it cold when i eat it and both when i don't look at it?

7 hours ago, Kombat engineer said:

Waiter why is my soup hot when i look at it cold when i eat it and both when i don't look at it?

Um, you know you are supposed to answer the poster's above question, right?

Cause quantum stuff

Waiter, why aren't you in my soup?

Well, it's... I'm.... It's just that..... I can't swim very well, sir...

Waiter! There's a hunk of firewood in my soup!

Ah, apologies good sir, but the chef has run out of pepper.

Waiter, why is my soup served on a book?

It was found books serve as great thermal insulators. The soup bowl is hot.

Waiter, why is the great white whale in my soup? Also how big is this bowl to fit a whale?

Well, if you'd notice, sir, you're sitting seaside. Now if you'll excuse me, I'll be needing me harpoon.

Waiter! There's a dog in my soup! And not a chihuahua either, like.... an Irish Wolfhound!

We have run out of chhu... that kind. If you don't like meat, just eat the stock.

Chef! Why did you not shave that wolfhound before cooking?

Sir, it would not have any flavor without the embedded ticks and fleas.

 

Waiters, is this cat soup?

Yes, but the real question is: is the cat dead or alive...? *X Files theme starts playing*

Waiter, why is a book on the quantum uncertainty principle in my soup?

The cat used it to study quantum mechanics and fluctuate from the pot.

Kitty-kitty-kitty, do you want some unknown meat?

Give me wet food.

Waiter! I found solid chunks of Endurium in my soup!

I'm sure it was there for a reason. Probably taste

Waiter! Why is a model sailboat in my soup?

The kerbals were testing their new design, they want realism on recovering  crews

Waiter! there is a SRB and a nuclear engine on my soup

Edited April 16, 2017 by DiscoveryKSP
